description.value: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes. You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Fly]{Fly} Speed equal to your Speed. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Darkvision]{Darkvision} if you don't already have it, and you gain the fiend trait and the trait appropriate to the type of servitor you've become (such as daemon, demon, or devil).
